medical_history.chief_complaint: Worsening right upper quadrant abdominal pain associated with nausea and non-bloody, non-bilious emesis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 day prior to admission and have worsened since onset.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cholelithiasis, GERD, prostate cancer status post resection, radiation, and hormonal therapy earlier this year.
